title: Design notes: communities home
body:
## Problem 
Suggestions/issues on implementation in Figma are [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS/Feedback-for-Mobile?node-id=1926-135773&t=IygHPkoLwgiVR8Xa-4)


## Expected fixes

- [ ] Add accent color to required components  (jump to, user avatar, + )
- [ ] Update tabs icons (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428397631))

### User avatar
- [ ] Add identicon ring (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428395871))
- [ ] Photo avatar or accent color if on avatar is set (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428391389))
- [ ]  Check online indicator mark (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428396527))

### Top bar icons
- [ ] Scan QR icon (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428394068))
- [ ] Notification bell icon  (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428395257)) 

### Discover
- [ ] Update copy (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428395364))
- [ ]  Check shadow (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428393826))
- [ ]  Check tabs background color (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428394418)) 
- [ ]  Add empty state (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1926:135772#428395620))
